list.name: Firezone (YC W22)
list.desc: A faster and simpler way to manage secure access to private resources. Basically a better VPN.

list.name: Finn
list.desc: SlackBot for running polls and random draws. Originally made because choosing where to eat lunch was too difficult at Jefit. There's a few hundred Slack teams using Finn from around the world.

list.name: Flock
list.desc: Email based habit tracker built with AWS Lambda, SendGrid, and Flask. I couldn't figure out how to make money with the 400 users, so I stopped paying the Sendgrid bill. I think a few hundred people still track their workouts with it.
